data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Kabul, Afghanistan.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kabul, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Kabul prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Kabul, Afghanistan.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Kabul. Through your servants plant 1,040 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Changgar people.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 5,203,710 who are far from you in Kabul, Afghanistan from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Kabul to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Kabul, Afghanistan. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

location.name: Kabul
location.cities_list: Kabul, Paghmān, Mīr Bachah Kōṯ, Istālif, Deh-e Now
location.cities_list_w_pop: Kabul (3,043,532), Paghmān (49,157), Mīr Bachah Kōṯ (5,405), Istālif, Deh-e Now
